channel.title: Cache Problems
channel.description:
Hey. I am using this Server [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/506645-veldahar-project-insanity.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/506645-veldahar-project-insanity.html[/url] that was by Jason and I can't get the cache to work. I have got the correct link yes, I have reuploaded and tried again yes and yet Im getting no where. Every time I start the client I get this error all the time
[code]Directory doesnt exist, making directory java.io.IOException: The system cannot find the path specified at java.io.WinNTFileSystem.createFileExclusively(Native Method) at java.io.File.createNewFile(Unknown Source) at UserSettings.loadSaveSettings(UserSettings.java:31) at client.startUp(client.java:7968) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:80) at client.run(client.java:5260) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Dec 01, 2013 10:17:37 PM CacheDownloader readCacheConfig INFO: Error parsing cache configuation file![/code]
Im really not sure what is going on and I really want to get the cache working so I can get the server online etc.
If you need any more codes just ask and I'll give them to you :)

item.title: Cache Problems
item.dc:creator: @Munien Munien
item.description:
@Munien wrote:

Can you please post the signlink.java and the cachedownloader.java class here please?

Read full topic

item.title: Cache Problems
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

Hey. I am using this Server http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/506645-veldahar-project-insanity.html that was by Jason and I can’t get the cache to work. I have got the correct link yes, I have reuploaded and tried again yes and yet Im getting no where. Every time I start the client I get this error all the time

Directory doesnt exist, making directory java.io.IOException: The system cannot find the path specified at java.io.WinNTFileSystem.createFileExclusively(Native Method) at java.io.File.createNewFile(Unknown Source) at UserSettings.loadSaveSettings(UserSettings.java:31) at client.startUp(client.java:7968) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:80) at client.run(client.java:5260) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Dec 01, 2013 10:17:37 PM CacheDownloader readCacheConfig INFO: Error parsing cache configuation file!

Im really not sure what is going on and I really want to get the cache working so I can get the server online etc.

If you need any more codes just ask and I’ll give them to you

Read full topic
